metadata.description: Comparing prices and making smart choices for fourth-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何比较价格做出明智的选择。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'This one is cheaper than that one'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: This one is cheaper than that one

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Being smart with money is important!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'What's the best value for money?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: What's the best value for money?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! You're becoming a wise shopper!
